status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Day 0
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"di20c","text":"Aspirate media and gently wash iPSCs with 1X DPBS","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 0
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bcb06","text":"Harvest iNIL/iNIP iPSCs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43nrr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 0
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7b5hl","text":"Count cells ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 0
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9sh80","text":"Seed directly into hMN media + Y-27632 (10 μM) + dox (3 μM) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bn8f5","text":"Seed at 8,000 cells/cm2 (Example: 600,000 cells/10cm dish)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":22,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"nl1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8ug5d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6bsbv","text":"Optional: Add antibiotic (ie. Penstrep) to hMN media to avoid contamination","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Day 2
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"d6sqd","text":"Aspirate all media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 2
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3rgd4","text":"Replenish with hMN media + Y-27632 (10 μM) + dox (3 μM), adding Retinoic Acid (RA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"13l2p","text":"iSpMNs: 1.0 μM RA","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22fvp","text":"iCrMNs: 0.01 μM RA","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 4
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5me0l","text":"Aspirate all media","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 4
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1h25a","text":"Replenish hMN media + dox (3 μM) + RA (iSpMN 1.0 μM/iCrMN 0.01 μM), removing Y-27632","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 6
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5imk2","text":"Carefully aspirate half of the total volume of media per well/dish","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 6
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bnra7","text":"Replenish hMN media + dox (3 μM) + RA (iSpMN 1.0 μM/iCrMN 0.01 μM) + Adarotene (1 μM)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 8
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8nikk","text":"Carefully aspirate half of the total volume of media per well/dish","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 8
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3ppr0","text":"Replenish hMN media + dox (3 μM) + RA (iSpMN 1.0 μM/iCrMN 0.01 μM) + Adarotene (1 μM) + supplements:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6c5i8","text":"BDNF (10 ng/mL)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"61t20","text":"GDNF (10 ng/mL)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"en11p","text":"CNTF (10 ng/mL)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6e9il","text":"L-ascorbic acid (200 ng/mL)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ej1rs","text":"Carefully aspirate half of the total volume of media per well/dish","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Day 0
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1qrcg","text":"Neutralize Accutase with  E8 Media + Y-27632 (10 μM) 2 times the amount of Accutase added (eg. If 2 mL of Accutase was used, resuspend in 4 mL of  E8 Media + Y-27632 (10 μM))","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
